fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Make a player infatuated with another each night. You may make players infatuated with yourself.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Infatuated players must visit the player they're infatuated with for the two nights after they're infatuated. With the Necronomicon, instead they will become obsessed, visiting that player for the rest of the game and dealing a Basic attack along with their action.
